#4 in Motion-Activated Wall Switches
Date First Available March 31, 2020

Price: $24.99 - $13.90
(as of Nov 30,2022 13:34:32 UTC – Details)


The Cync Wire-Free Smart Motion Sensor adds programmable motion to Cync and C by GE Smart Bulbs, Smart Switches and Smart Plugs. The sensor automatically turns lights and devices on when motion is detected in the room and turns them off when the room is unoccupied. The smart Bluetooth sensor connects wirelessly to Cync and C by GE Smart Bulbs, Smart Plugs and Smart Switches to provide whole room motion control. The motion settings are adjustable so lights can come on slowly at nighttime or be set to deactivate during certain times. Set lights to turn on based on natural light and motion in the room. Pair with a Cync or C by GE Smart Plug and automatically turn off devices like curling irons after you left the room. With a replaceable battery rated to last over two years and multiple mounting and positioning options, it’s easy to get expansive motion coverage anywhere in your home.
Motion sensor lights: The battery powered motion sensor triggers Cync and C by GE smart bulbs, smart plugs, and smart switches to turn on when someone enters the room. Place the motion sensor on a shelf or table, or mount with the included brackets.
Programmable motion sensor: Schedule your wire-free motion sensor to deactivate during certain hours or turn light bulbs on softly at nighttime. Make any room in your house have motion activated light. Replaceable battery rated to last over two years.
Save money and energy: Lights can be turned off after 5 minutes if no motion is detected by the motion sensor. Ambient light detection keeps lights from turning on when natural light fills the room.
Automatically turn off devices: Connect this smart motion sensor to a Cync or C by GE Smart Plug in the Cync app, and the motion sensor will automatically turn off devices like flat irons or space heaters if no one is in the room.
Expansive motion coverage: With multiple positioning options, it’s easy to get expansive motion activated light anywhere in your home. The motion sensor’s pivoting head and 105 degree coverage detect areas up to 20 feet.

Wire-Free Smart Motion Sensor

You can now get programmable motion detection anywhere.

Read more

Add Motion Sensing Anywhere

The Wire-Free Motion Sensor triggers C by GE Smart Lights, Plugs, and Switches to turn on and light up whenever someone enters the room.

Read more

Programmable Motion Sensing

Schedule your sensor to deactivate during certain hours, or to soften lights at night.

Detects Ambient Light

When your room’s washed in natural light, the Wire-Free Motion Sensor will keep your bulbs turned off.

No Hub Required

Connect to your other C by GE devices like smart bulbs, plugs, and switches using Bluetooth. You won’t need any additional tech, hubs, or bridges!

Read more

Expansive Coverage

Since the sensor pivots and swivels,with 105-degree wide-angle coverage and a 20-foot range, it detects motion in the whole room.

Easy Installation

Simply place your sensor on a shelf or table—or even mount it to the wall with included brackets.

Replaceable Battery Lasts Two Years

With a battery life that lasts 2+ years,you can control your lights to your heart’s content. And since the battery is replaceable, you can re-up for your set-up.

Read more

Read more

item.title: GE CYNC Indoor Smart Plug, Bluetooth and Wi-Fi Outlet Socket, Works with Alexa and Google Home (1 Pack)
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) The Cync Smart Plug makes any lamp or device that plugs into a wall smart. The built-in Wi-Fi bridge adds out-of-home control for your lighting and devices and voice control when paired with a voice assistant. The plug also enables scheduling and scene setting to traditional bulbs and devices. The ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $14.99 - $13.62
(as of Nov 29,2022 06:03:50 UTC – Details)


The Cync Smart Plug makes any lamp or device that plugs into a wall smart. The built-in Wi-Fi bridge adds out-of-home control for your lighting and devices and voice control when paired with a voice assistant. The plug also enables scheduling and scene setting to traditional bulbs and devices. The Smart Plug adds smart functionality to fixtures where smart bulbs won’t fit or match the look of the fixture. Pair the Smart Plug with Cync or C by GE Smart Bulbs in other fixtures and Smart Switches to control all your lights together. Use the Smart Plug with other devices like curling irons, fans and electronic devices to turn them on or off remotely or schedule them to operate around your routine. The Smart Plug connects directly with Google Home and Amazon Alexa devices without a hub required. Simply plug into a standard wall socket and you’re ready to go.
Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 2.36 x 2.36 x 4.49 inches; 3.21 Ounces
Item model number ‏ : ‎ 93129694
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ June 4, 2021
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ GE Lighting
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B0948L7Z5W
Country of Origin ‏ : ‎ China

Upgrade your smart home: Compatible with Google Home and Alexa (sold separately), smart plugs from Cync make your traditional devices smart by providing voice and app control at all times, even when you are out of home.
Smart outlets make any electronic device smart: The Cync smart plug makes any lamp or electric device smart, so smart plugs and devices respond to voice commands as an entire smart home system.
Control smart plugs while away from home: Get added home security and convenience with the ability to control your electric devices away from home with these Wi-Fi outlets, so you never worry about leaving your iron on or coming home to a dark house.
Build your smart home with no hub required: The Cync smart plugs that work with Google Home and Alexa include a hub that connects directly to voice assistant devices, so you don’t need to purchase a standalone bridge or hub.
Smart plug comes in a compact size: The Cync smart plugs that work with Alexa and Google Home feature a slim design that keeps the second outlet in standard wall outlets available to plug in another device or smart plug.

Smart Plug

Makes any lamp or electric device smart – giving you more convenience and control.

Read more

Adds Smart Functionality to Devices

Make other electric devices smart in any room of the house – like slow cookers, space heaters, or curling irons.

Schedule Your Flat Iron

For peace of mind, schedule devices like your flat iron to warm up before you get out of bed – and to turn off when you’re not home.

Control Devices From Across The Room

For added convenience, use your voice to control devices like fans from across the room, or set a schedule to turn them on before you arrive home (voice assistant required).

Read more

Keep Your House Secure

Pair your smart plug with Cync and C by GE Smart Bulbs to enjoy out-of-home control through the Cync app.

Never Come Home to a Dark House

Schedule and automate your lighting through the Smart Plug and make sure you always come home to a well-lit house.

Enable More Features for Your Cync Bulbs

Using a voice assistant, you can enjoy the hands-free control capabilities if Cync or C by GE smart products.

Read more

Pairs With Your Voice Assistant

Read more
